footer.text: You no longer have to worry about transportation in a foreign country or during important events.

hero.title: The best way to
hero.subtitle: Relax while traveling
hero.text: You no longer have to worry about transportation in a foreign country or during important events. Our private transfers will provide you with peace of mind, comfort, and reliability, even in the most unusual situations.

about.title: Mavr-Trans
about.subtitle: Your comfort is our task.
about.text: With more than 10 years of experience in the industry, Mavr-Trans is your reliable choice for transportation throughout Italy and beyond. It doesn't matter whether you are in Italy for work or a tourist, our company will make sure that you travel on time and comfortably and get only the best impressions from your trip. We have a large selection of types of cars, which will help you choose exactly what you want and for the number of people you need, regardless of whether you are traveling alone, with family or colleagues. We will take care of your comfort, speed, and optimal route.

first.title: Personal Route
first.text: We understand that your travel needs may be unique. Our company offers personalized itineraries and services that meet your needs, be it for leisure, work, or events

second.title: Exclusive Convenience
second.text: You can be sure of safety and style when traveling with us. The highest standard of service and modern cars for your convenience.

third.title: Service
third.text: Book a trip from anywhere in the world in a few clicks on our website, and get quick feedback from our managers

questions.question: How can I book a private transfer with your company?
questions.answer: You can also use our online booking service on the website for ease and speed, you need to choose the route, car, and detailed options using the help on the website, and pay for the services. Or you can leave your contact information to be contacted by our manager. The option of sending a message to the messenger is also available.

questions.question: What types of payments do you accept for transfer services?
questions.answer: We accept various types of payments, including credit and debit cards, electronic transfers, and other payment methods. The main payment method is payment using the payment system installed on the site. But if you need additional methods, leave your contact details and our manager will contact you.

questions.question: Is it possible to choose the type of vehicle for transportation?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer the possibility to choose the type of car according to your comfort and needs. You can choose the one that best suits your trip from the list of available cars.

questions.question: Does your service work around the clock, or are there any restrictions on the time of ordering a transfer?
questions.answer: Our service is available 7 days a week. You can order a transfer at a time convenient for you, even in the most unexpected situations.

questions.question: How can I cancel or change my reservation?
questions.answer: To cancel or change your reservation, please contact our customer service team as far in advance as possible. We are ready to help you.

questions.question: Do you provide additional services, such as child seats or an additional driver?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide additional services such as child seats, an additional driver, and many others. Please let us know your needs when booking.

questions.question: How can I contact you for additional questions or assistance during my trip?
questions.answer: You can reach our customer support team using the contacts provided on our website. We are always ready to answer your questions and provide assistance.

questions.question: What regions or cities does your company serve?
questions.answer: Our company provides transfer services in various regions and cities of Italy. For more information on the locations we serve, please contact us.

confirmation.title: Confirmed
confirmation.text: Your application has been processed and a manager will contact you soon.

error.title: An error has occurred
error.text: We were unable to process your request. Please try again later.
